name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
DUNGEON ESCAPE

Dungeon Escape finds you in a dark and musky dungeon, with a gun... that runs on money. To get out of here, you see a rocket ship to blast out of here, unfortunately, it's broken, and so you need to blast out of here, collect the parts needed to fix the rocket ship, and while you're at it kill, some of the undead!

CONTROLS

A / D to Walk
W or [Space] to Jump
Left Click or [Enter] to Shoot
Tab to Upgrade your stats
Esc to Pause Game

CREDITS
